double-book.translation[0].definitions[0: to promise the same seat in a theatre, on a plane etc to more than one person by mistake
double-book.translation[1].definitions[0: to promise the same hotel room, seat in a theatre, table at a restaurant etc to more than one person by mistake
The Grand was double-booked and had to offer us the first week at another hotel, which was, in our opinion, inferior.
